00018 class BtAlertMessageWindow : public MmiAlert
00019 {
00020     private:
00021         typedef MmiAlert Base;
00022 
00023     public:
00024         // Enumeration for text display in allert box
00025         typedef enum
00026         {
00027             // Pairing
00028             BtAmwPair,
00029             // Unpairing
00030             BtAmwUnpair,
00031             // Trusing
00032             BtAmwTrust,
00033             // Untrusting
00034             BtAmwUntrust,
00035             // Setting remote device name
00036             BtAmwSetName,
00037             // Querying the supported accessory profiles
00038             BtAmwQuerySupportedProfiles,
00039             // DUN connection established notification
00040             BtAmwDunConnect,
00041             // DUN connection released notification
00042             BtAmwDunDisconnect,
00043             //HS connection established notification
00044             BtAmwHsConnect,
00045             //HS connection released notification
00046             BtAmwHsDisconnect,
00047             //HS call transfer to phone notification
00048             BtAmwHsCallTransferToPhone,
00049             //HS call transfer to headset notification
00050             BtAmwHsCallTransferToHeadset,
00051             //
00052             BtAmwHfConnect,
00053             //
00054             BtAmwHfDisconnect,
00055             //
00056             BtAmwHfAudio2Phone,
00057             //
00058             BtAmwHfAudio2Hf,
00059             //FAX connection established notification
00060             BtAmwFaxConnect,
00061             //FAX connection released notification
00062             BtAmwFaxDisconnect,
00063             // to inform use supported profile
00064             BtAmwSupportedProfile,
00065             // Service Verify
00066             BtAmwServiceVerify
00067 
00068         } BtAmwType;
